sections.name: Your job details
sections.description:
In this section we need to know about your job and the dates you were employed. The following documents, if you have them, will help you with the questions:

  • your contract of employment
  • recent payslips
  • any official letter of redundancy
  • any other documents showing your employment details

sections.name: Company name
sections.question: What company did you work for?

sections.name: Employee, roll or works number
sections.question: Did you have an employee, roll or works number?

sections.name: Start date
sections.question: On what date did you start your employment?

sections.name: Last day worked
sections.question: What was the last date you worked there?

sections.name: Was this your official end date?
Notice given by employer
sections.question: Did your employer give you any formal notice?

sections.name: Would you like to claim compensation for loss of notice?
When did you write to your employer or an Employment Tribunal about the redundancy pay you were owed?
Redundancy payment received from Digital Testing Two Limited?
Are you owed any holiday pay?
Start date of your holiday year
How many days holiday per year, including bank holidays, were you entitled to?
How many untaken holiday days have you carried forward to this holiday year?
How many holiday days have you taken this holiday year, including bank holidays?
Did your wages have any compulsory deductions, excluding National Insurance and income tax?
Did your employer attempt to pay you?
What is the gross amount of pay owed for this period?
Did you have any breaks in employment including redundancy or unemployment, and excluding sick leave, maternity or paternity leave?
Did you have any periods of being on strike?
Did you have any period of working abroad for this employer while not paying UK National Insurance contributions?
Have you been awarded any payments in relation to your job ending by an Employment tribunal?
Do you owe Digital Testing Limited any money?
Is there anything else you wish to tell us about your claim?
